error.signature: containers with unready status: [sidecar-container] — pod not ready due to sidecar

verdict.summary: Sidecar container is not ready, preventing the entire pod from being marked as Ready. Common with service mesh proxies and logging sidecars.

dead_ends.action: Remove the sidecar container from the pod
dead_ends.why_fails: Breaks service mesh connectivity, logging, or monitoring that depends on the sidecar

dead_ends.action: Ignore the readiness check and send traffic anyway
dead_ends.why_fails: Traffic may fail if the sidecar (e.g., Envoy proxy) is required for routing

workarounds.action: Check sidecar container logs to find the failure reason
workarounds.how: kubectl logs <pod> -c <sidecar-name> — look for certificate errors, config issues, or port conflicts

workarounds.action: Verify sidecar configuration and resource limits — sidecars often need specific memory/CPU
workarounds.how: kubectl describe pod <pod> to check sidecar resource usage and events

leads_to.condition: when sidecar readiness probe keeps failing

preceded_by.condition: when Istio sidecar is injected but misconfigured

frequently_confused_with.distinction: sidecar-not-ready specifically involves a sidecar container, while readiness-probe-failed can affect any container in the pod
